text: Richard Duane "Rick" Warren (born January 28, 1954) is both founder and pastor of the evangelical Baptist Saddleback Church in Southern California. It is the largest church in California. He is also the best-selling author of many Christian books, such as The Purpose Driven Life. He is also an influential evangelical leader. Warren was born in San Jose, California. == Other websites == Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American Baptist ministers Category:American Evangelicals Category:American Christian writers Category:People from San Jose, California Category:Writers from California
title: Rick Warren
